ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker.views

Class UserSelectActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker.views.UserSelectActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserInformationDialog.UserInformationDialogListener, ViewInterface

    public class UserSelectActivity
extends Activity
implements ViewInterface, UserInformationDialog.UserInformationDialogListener
    The first activity that is called when the app starts. The activity allows the user to pick, create, edit or delete existing accounts on the device, assign a home location to them, and sign in with one of them
    Author:
    Team3ScandalouStopwatch

    • Method Detail

      • onCreateContextMenu

        public void onCreateContextMenu(ContextMenu menu,
                       View v,
                       ContextMenuInfo menuInfo)
        Creates a context menu that is displayed whenever a user is clicked on. The menu allows the user to add a geolocation through gps, a map or clear the existing geolocation. It also allows them to delete the account they long clicked on.

      • onContextItemSelected

        public boolean onContextItemSelected(MenuItem item)
        Executes actions depending on which menu item the user clicked on. These include the user adding a geolocation through gps, a map or clearing the existing geolocation. Or delete the account they long clicked on.

      • setUpDisplay

        public void setUpDisplay()
        Sets up the user ListView and button for adding a new user.

      • onDialogPositiveClick

        public void onDialogPositiveClick(DialogFragment dialog)
        Specified by:

      • onDialogNegativeClick

        public void onDialogNegativeClick(DialogFragment dialog)
        Does not do anything except exiting the alert dialog.
        Specified by:
        onDialogNegativeClick in interface UserInformationDialog.UserInformationDialogListener

      • onCreateOptionsMenu

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
        Creates the default action bar menu since it does not need to have a change user option.

      • update

        Refreshes the user ListView.
